intro: Hemistemma ledifolium, commonly known as the narrow-leafed hemistemma, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its trailing growth habit and opposite, ovate leaves. Due to its ornamental value, it is sometimes cultivated in gardens, although it requires careful management to prevent it from becoming invasive.
